name: Animated Self portrait by Mamadou Sow 2021
description: A very rare animated edition from a self-portrait series. As an artist i have problems with realistic self-portrayal, they are probably the only ones i will ever paint as nft. In the image are items that identify me. Obsolete values that shape me as a member of a particular successful society. Torn between tradition and self-reflection. I am drowning in all the assets that supposedly define my worth as a human being.
